pages.text: The Philosopher's Mace is the ultimate weapon/tool as not only can it smash enemies into pieces, but it can also mine blocks like a pickaxe or a shovel. When a target is struck with the mace, they gained Gold Touch effect, which causes them to drop Gold Nuggets upon death.
As Netherite Tools are used to forge this weapon/tool, the mace is fire-resistant and will not be destroyed when in fire or lava.
